mapper.insert: insert into user (uId, uCode, uName, uPwd, uSex, uPhone, uStartTime, uPeopleNum, uHouseCode, utheme, hId) values (#{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ucode,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{uname,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{upwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usex,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{uphone,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{ustarttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{upeoplenum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{uhousecode,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{utheme,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{hid,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update user set uCode = #{ucode,jdbcType=CHAR}, uName = #{uname,jdbcType=CHAR}, uPwd = #{upwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, uSex = #{usex,jdbcType=CHAR}, uPhone = #{uphone,jdbcType=CHAR}, uPeopleNum = #{upeoplenum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, uHouseCode = #{uhousecode,jdbcType=CHAR}, hId = #{hid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where uId = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select uId, uCode, uName, uPwd, uSex, uPhone, uStartTime, uPeopleNum, uHouseCode, utheme, hId from user where uId = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select uId, uCode, uName, uPwd, uSex, uPhone, uStartTime, uPeopleNum, uHouseCode, utheme, hId from user
